name: electron-vscode-tests
description: Electron testing framework for VS Code automation using Playwright

scripts.test:headed: npm run build && HEADLESS=false playwright test
scripts.test:headless: npm run build && HEADLESS=true playwright test
scripts.test:debug: npm run build && HEADLESS=false SLOW_MO=500 playwright test --debug
scripts.test:chromium: npm run build && BROWSER=chromium playwright test
scripts.test:firefox: npm run build && BROWSER=firefox playwright test
scripts.test:webkit: npm run build && BROWSER=webkit playwright test
scripts.test:all-browsers: npm run build && BROWSER=all playwright test
scripts.test:slow: npm run build && SLOW_MO=1000 playwright test

author: AZ ML Workspace Team
